image.png

This screenshot is for issue #20044. @Alya Abbott please suggest any changes if needed.

The implementation should look reasonable if an org chooses a long name.

Maybe a new optional field like 'Display name' in organization settings would serve this best, with us defaulting to using ellipses is the name is too long.

Could you share a screenshot with the default Zulip logo as well, since that's what a lot of orgs will have?

We probably just want to use the color of the surrounding text; the org name is helpful, but I don't think we need to specifically draw attention to it.
I'm not sure what folks think about the size, capitalization and centering.
I feel like it should be left-justified, since everything else in that sidebar is.

image.png

With ellipsis

image.png

Without ellipsis
Which one is better?

Rohitt Vashishtha said:

The implementation should look reasonable if an org chooses a long name.

Maybe a new optional field like 'Display name' in organization settings would serve this best, with us defaulting to using ellipses is the name is too long.

Sorry for sliding into this discussion :) But I'd really like to emphasize this argument from Rohitt Vashishtha. Maybe it could also be useful to be able to remove the organization name completely from the left sidebar. I think that most of the folks will not need the org name as a location hint there and will just wonder why it takes up screen place...
Now that I think of it, its better to just have one of either a custom logo or a plaintext name. That way, it'd still use the same amount of space and not feel like redundant information.
image.png

Showing the org name could certainly be a display option. The option could default to "on" if the organization is using the default Zulip logo, and "off" if it has set up its own logo; we could offer to toggle the new user default when the organization adds or removes a custom logo.
The one line version is better than two lines, but it's not quite working for me visually either.

image.png

I think reducing the size of organization name might look better
Alya Abbott said:

The one line version is better than two lines, but it's not quite working for me visually either.

I added an option for displaying organization name in organization settings, and default is set to "on":

image.png
Can you confirm if this is where the display setting should be?
I'm not the decision maker here, but my inclination would be to put this option next to where you set the organization name, in Organization Profile.

Hm, I'm open to other ideas, but the proposal above was to make this a personal display setting. The organization admins would could control the default for new users via the "Default user settings" panel.
So I think it would go under Personal settings > Display settings > Advanced. I'm not sure where exactly in that section, but that's easy enough to change when merging the PR.
Yeah, I agree this should be a personal setting.

I have made PR #20426 for the issue. Please suggest any changes if needed.
Thank you!
Thanks! The setting definitely needs to be moved a bit; it's currently in between two related settings. I'd maybe put it after "High contrast mode".
I think there's still something odd about how the organization name looks visually... Did you add extra spacing between letters?
Could you also post another screenshot on the PR with an org name that fits without overlflowing? Maybe in light mode?

Yes, there is extra spacing between letters of 0.1em. The following screenshot depicts how it would look without spacing:
image.png

I have edited my PR #20426 post with shorter org name in light mode.
I will change the other screenshots (settings) after committing all changes (organization name letter spacing).

image.png

@Alya Abbott I have made PR #20426 for issue #20044. Please suggest any changes if needed.

Thank You!
@Alya Abbott @Tim Abbott can you review my PR #20426? I solved all the conflicts.

@Alya Abbott @Tim Abbott A polite bump on this issue.

I have solved all the merge conflicts and rebased my PR. (I started rebasing from feature level 113 and now its 131 :stuck_out_tongue_closed_eyes: )

Thank you!
I know that Alya and Tim are off for some number of days, so don’t expect super fast response please. But I’m sure they will get back to this.
